property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Rogues you control get +1/+1. Whenever one or more Rogues you control deal combat damage to a player, that player mills a card for each 1 damage dealt to them. If the player mills at least one creature card this way, you draw a card. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature with trample and haste until end of turn, where X is Obuun's power. It's still a land. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, exile target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard. When Trove Warden dies, put each permanent card exiled with it onto the battlefield under the control of that card's owner.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowl {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Sphinx or Rogue.) Flying When Enigma Thief enters the battlefield, for each opponent, return up to one target nonland permanent that player controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: First strike Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, goad each creature target player controls. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its crystalline core refracts light into chaos.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature with trample and haste until end of turn, where X is Obuun's power. It's still a land. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Rogues you control get +1/+1. Whenever one or more Rogues you control deal combat damage to a player, that player mills a card for each 1 damage dealt to them. If the player mills at least one creature card this way, you draw a card. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Outlast {W} ({W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fastest way across the dunes is above.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may exile target nonland permanent other than Admonition Angel. When Admonition Angel leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Champion reached for a stone, and Heliod placed the sun into her hand. - The Theriad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now." - Alovnek, Boros guildmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Exile target artifact. • Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elite Scaleguard enters the battlefield, bolster 2. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.) Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return target nonland permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If that land is a Plains, you may return that nonland permanent card to the battlefield instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {3} less to cast if there are ten or more nonland permanents on the battlefield. Destroy all nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the first moments, the gate to the afterlife opened, and the people were prostrate in the light of the God-Pharaoh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all nonland creatures. Awaken 4 - {5}{W}{W}{W} (If you cast this spell for {5}{W}{W}{W}, also put four +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one - • Create a 1/1 white Kor Ally creature token. • Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blazing sun that never sets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Together Forever enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) {1}: Choose target creature with a counter on it. When that creature dies this turn, return that card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can come back once you've learned some manners - and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts - on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Faerie Vandal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: History may be written by the triumphant, but it's often rewritten by the troublesome.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Invisible Stalker can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All that concerns me is the vampires' sense of smell and those freezing Nephalian nights."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Prowl {2}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Faerie or Rogue.) When Latchkey Faerie enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Marang River Prowler can't block and can't be blocked. You may cast Marang River Prowler from your graveyard as long as you control a black or green permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The currents of the Marang wash away both tracks and blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Master Thief enters the battlefield, gain control of target artifact for as long as you control Master Thief.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Possession is ten-tenths of the law.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To know the battlefield is to anticipate the enemy. To know the enemy is to anticipate victory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Nightveil Sprite attacks, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're on the fortieth floor, with one window, no balcony. No one could possibly get in." - Minosz, Orzhov chief of security

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowl {5}{U} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Rogue.) Create X 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature tokens with flying, where X is the damage dealt to your opponents this turn. If this spell's prowl cost was paid, take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: X target creatures can't be blocked this turn. Until end of turn, those creatures gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The one thing the Gatewatch didn't expect to find on a plane ruled by Nicol Bolas was perfection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Scourge of Fleets enters the battlefield, return each creature your opponents control with toughness X or less to its owner's hand, where X is the number of Islands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some naga initiates move as silently as the suns' reflections on the water.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who will miss you, drywalker? A wife? A child? Perhaps they will blame the sea for your fate, and teach future generations to stay far away from it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Whirler Rogue enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) Changeling Outcast can't block and can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mercurial face sows distrust. Distrust reaps a lonely life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains indestructible. If it's your turn, scry 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Goblin spells and Rogue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Frogtossers thread feathers, bones, and trophies from past raids into their standards, believing they fuel the warren with the anger of its victims.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Gonti, Lord of Luxury enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures you don't control and all planeswalkers you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beyond pain, beyond obsession and wild despair, there lies a place of twisted power only the most tormented souls can reach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Marsh Flitter enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens. Sacrifice a Goblin: Marsh Flitter has base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By fate or by will, every reign must come to an end." - Kethis, the Hidden Hand

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile Necromantic Selection.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {2}{B}{B} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Nighthowler and enchanted creature each get +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token. Rats you control have deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too." - Branko One-Ear

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Each other Rogue creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a legendary creature. Destroy target creature. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is no excuse for disobedience." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) When Sepulchral Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowl {1}{B} (You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a Goblin or Rogue.) Whenever a Rogue you control attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature dies, or a creature card is put into a graveyard from anywhere other than the battlefield, or a creature card leaves your graveyard, Syr Konrad, the Grim deals 1 damage to each opponent. {1}{B}: Each player mills a card. (They each put the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now that's dangerous."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It fears no sword and leaves no bones behind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Armorcraft Judge enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Were she not a judge, she'd win the division herself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The shortest path between two points is not always the safest." - Tamina, district guide

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elvish Rejuvenator enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Land creatures you control have vigilance. Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target land you control become a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To care for yourself, cultivate the world. To care for the world, cultivate yourself."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Animals commune with their environment without the need for language. Theirs is a fundamental connection that surpasses flimsy words." - Vivien Reid

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Roil redraws the world as it passes, leaving only the hedrons unchanged.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it. Those creatures gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now is the hour. Ours is the duty. For victory and family - charge!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more non-Human creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the lion knows more stories than I do." - Chulane, Teller of Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land grows only where the kami will it." - Dosan the Falling Leaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) I, II - Mill two cards, then you may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand. III - Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, then shuffle your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach, trample Multani, Yavimaya's Avatar gets +1/+1 for each land you control and each land card in your graveyard. {1}{G}, Return two lands you control to their owner's hand: Return Multani from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to three basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. You gain 7 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her connection to the plane restored, Nissa felt the power of Zendikar surge through her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the land is angry, so are they." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Draw cards equal to the greatest power among non-Human creatures you control. • Non-Human creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. Each player may play an additional land on each of their turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dance, and bring forth the coil! It is an umbilical to Gaea herself, fattening us with the earth's rich bounty."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Satyr Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first satyr to wake after a revel must search for the site of the next one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you threaten its territory, it produces spores. Actually, no matter what you do, it produces spores." - Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Springbloom Druid enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "New growth applies a healing poultice to wounds long scabbed over."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance As long as you control six or more lands, Sylvan Advocate and land creatures you control get +2/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land gives of itself. Its abundance provides, even in times of chaos."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Outlast {G} ({G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One quiet word sets off the stampede.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. That land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our foes are many and mighty, but not as many as the trees or as mighty as the sea."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. {2}, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 green Elemental creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was wrong. Zendikar isn't after me. It isn't after any of us. It's not evil or vengeful. It's magnificent . . . but it's in pain." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards. Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player mills two cards. Then you put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you want to wreak havoc above, sometimes it's best to look below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing." - Narbulg Nine Fingers

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may have Lazav, Dimir Mastermind become a copy of that card, except its name is Lazav, Dimir Mastermind, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has hexproof and this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, Discard a land card: Living Twister deals 2 damage to any target. {G}: Return a tapped land you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The ancient places of Ravnica awaken, stirred by the hoofbeats of Ilharg!" - Nikya of the Old Ways

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. {R}{G}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Greenweaver Mina and her twin brother Denn lead the last of the Mul Daya into an uncertain future.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Naya Charm deals 3 damage to target creature. • Return target card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. • Tap all creatures target player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash If an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 5/5 red and green Elemental creature token. Whenever Omnath, Locus of Rage or another Elemental you control dies, Omnath deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {X}{UB}: Choose a color. Target opponent exiles the top X cards of their library. For each card of the chosen color exiled this way, create a 1/1 blue and black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two - • Counter target noncreature spell. • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. • Destroy target planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Counter target creature spell. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Birth and death are both reversible." - Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cast this spell only during combat. Untap target creature you don't control and gain control of it. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 3 or more life this turn, you may draw a card. (Damage causes loss of life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not a matter of deserving. It's a matter of strength. The power to hold versus the power to take."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Treacherous Terrain deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of lands that player controls. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: It spilled the blood of one elder dragon. In Gideon's hands, it may yet taste another's.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It harmonizes with the essence of its master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {U}{B}: Dimir Keyrune becomes a 2/2 blue and black Horror artifact creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A key that slips through every lock.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {UB}{UB}{UB}{UB}, {T}, Sacrifice Dimir Locket: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wear this, and take your place among the shadows - wise, lethal, and unseen." - Ivrelya, Dimir spymaster

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members - and the doomed.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?" - Jhoira, master artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) As Obelisk of Urd enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +2/+2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sandstone Oracle enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Scaretiller becomes tapped, choose one - • You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. • Return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fields of battle turn to fields of grain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Living weapon (When this Equipment enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.) Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded up. Equip {3}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The shadow travels toward the apex. I predict we will soon see the true measure of darkness."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {3}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Woodland: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Boros Garrison enters the battlefield tapped. When Boros Garrison enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {R}{W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enter with merciful hearts. Exit with battle cries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Cryptic Caves: Draw a card. Activate only if you control five or more lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only when you've given up the search will the caves yield their secrets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Myriad Landscape enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Myriad Landscape: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Naya Panorama: Search your library for a basic Mountain, Forest, or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Between the thunderous footfalls of Naya's behemoths lie moments of perfect quiet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Needle Spires enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {2}{R}{W}: Needle Spires becomes a 2/1 red and white Elemental creature with double strike until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.value: Rumors quickly spread among thieves about a labyrinth without walls and a prize beyond all measures of worth.

property.value: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.
